channel.title: How to create a virtual server on your pc so you can use website programs
channel.description:
Hi i am have been doing few websites for my school projects and i want to learn how to use some few softwares like SMF, Joomla and few other softwares. but the problem is that i do not have a server to install them on and i am not willing to pay to rent a server because i will only be going on it during weekends.
So i wanted to now if there was a program so i can create a virtual server on my pc or anything that well help me install these software so i can learn how to use them.

item.title: How to create a virtual server on your pc so you can use website programs
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:9, topic:204949”][quote author=jagex_fagex link=topic=270576.msg2230523#msg2230523 date=1211105695]
try wamp.

best one imo… or easyphp

either or. XAMPP is crap lol
[/quote]
WAMP isn’t a server software it stands for
Windows Apache MySQL PHP/Python/Perl
EasyPHP is my recommendation.[/quote]No. He’s talking about WampServer, which is what I use.

Read full topic

best one imo… or easyphp

either or. XAMPP is crap lol[/quote]

Windows Apache MySQL PHP/Python/Perl
EasyPHP is my recommendation.

item.source: How to create a virtual server on your pc so you can use website programs

item.title: How to create a virtual server on your pc so you can use website programs
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

You don’t need a server OS to run a Webpage.

If you have/download Apache, PHP and MySql on your normal PC i don’t think you need more.
Maybe no-ip.com if you don’t have a static IP.

Read full topic
